title: Carmen
brief_description: Bizet’s opera in four acts tells of the sultry and seductive Carmen, who manipulates the hearts of men and causes her own destruction. This production by the Metropolitan Opera House in New York features Agnes Baltsa as Carmen, Jose Carreras as Don Jose and was performed in 1987.
